short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hey Tribe fans! Finally, you can show your support for your team in your Gmail messages using our extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With just a click of a button, add banners of your favorite Cleveland Indians to your outgoing email. 

We value your privacy and do not collect any email content or email addresses.
